articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates to Ordinary Session of AU
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates to Ordinary Session of AU
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to the 24th Ordinary Session of the Assembly of Heads of State and Government of the African Union to be held in Addis Ababa.
					 Extending warm greetings to all delegates attending the ordinary session, the message said that the initiatives and efforts of the African Union to strengthen unity and solidarity among continental countries and achieve the peace, stability and social and economic development of the region in view of foreign forces' domination and interference are arousing positive support and sympathy among the Korean people and world progressives.
					
					 Reiterating the invariable stand of the DPRK to further expand and develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the AU and its member nations onto a new higher stage, the message wished the ordinary session great successes in its work for promoting revival, sustainable development and co-prosperity of Africa.

articles.title: March to Paektusan Camp Made by Young Vanguard in Ryanggang Province
articles.content:
March to Paektusan Camp Made by Young Vanguard in Ryanggang Province
 Samjiyon, January 28 (KCNA) -- A march to leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp was made by young vanguard in Ryanggang Province from January 22 to 27 with the approach of his birth anniversary.
					 During the march the marchers laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung at the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo, in the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site and Chongbong Bivouac and on the shore of Lake Samji and mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu at the secret camp and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 At Pochonbo the marchers listened to the explanation about the revolutionary battle site before going round the command post for the Battle in Pochonbo, the then police post of the Japanese imperialists, the sub-county office, etc. 
					
					 They arrived at the secret camp via the Spring Site in Poso-ri, the Tableland of Junghung, the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site and Chongbong and Konchang bivouacs. 
					
					 They looked round historic relics preserved in the birthplace. 
					
					 In front of the birthplace of Kim Jong Il they held a meeting for adopting a letter to be presented to Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Upon their arrival at Samjiyon they were briefed on the Samjiyon Grand Monument and looked round groups of sculptures. 
					
					 During the march they held a question-and-answer study, contest in singing revolutionary songs in chorus while marching in array, entertainments and other colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: Mineral Output Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Mineral Output Up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Mineral output is now rising at mines of the DPRK.
					 The Hyesan Youth Mine increased its output 50 percent over the same period of last year.
					
					 The mine carried out 80 percent of its monthly tunneling quota in the first seven days of the new year. It has been operating dressing plant at full capacity to raise the actual concentration rate.
					
					 The Tongam Mine is boosting the production of apatite concentrate by applying advanced blasting method and raising the operational rate of mining machines. It has carried out daily quota at 110 percent.
					
					 Meanwhile, production of mining machines is put on a normal basis.
					
					 The Jonchon Rock-drill Factory has hit daily target after introducing lots of technological innovations.

articles.title: Janggi, Korean's Favorite Folk Game
articles.content:
Janggi, Korean's Favorite Folk Game
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Janggi (Korean chess) is one of the typical folklore amusement games in Korea.
					 Many of people in the DPRK have loved much to play this folklore game. Chess fans can be seen playing Janggi in parks or pleasure grounds even in winter.
					
					 Janggi has a long history and it was widely introduced already in the period of Koryo Dynasty (918-1392), Im Sung Bin, section chief of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA, adding:
					
					 Janggi is much different in playing rules and way from not only Western chess but Chinese chess. It is believed that Koreans began playing chess earlier than the Westerners and Chinese.
					
					 The arrangement of its chessmen gives a glimpse of intelligence and sagacity of the Koreans. It was told in the olden times that local military strategists would find out tactics while playing Janggi.
					
					 There are a lot of anecdotes and sayings related to Janggi, and one of them is a saying "A kibitzer disregards getting slapped in the cheek."

articles.title: DPRK Pays Effort to Conserving Marine Resources
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Effort to Conserving Marine Resources
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea pays big efforts to conserving the marine resources and exploiting them in an effective way.
					 It has intensified the state unified management system and legal mechanism over the marine resources and environment as well as the supervising function.
					
					 A work is also going on to build up an overall marine database. 
					
					 The government has funneled much effort into sci-tech steps for exploiting the marine resources in an overall and sustained way on the principle of coastal management and protecting the marine ecological environment.
					
					 A nationwide concern focuses on the work to raise aquatic resources through survey of ecology and boost fisheries output with the introduction of scientific fishing methods. And efforts are made to pushing the aquaculture on a large scale and expanding the areas for conservation and propagation of aquatic resources.
					
					 Besides, researches are made into an effective way of exploiting mineral resources under the sea and a brisk work goes to prevent the sea tourist destinations from being polluted and spruce up them in a diverse and peculiar way.
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK government has planned to increase the renewable energy resources by developing various kinds of tidal power and sea wind generators to suit the specific conditions of the country.
					
					 It is attaching importance to the work for making the citizens have a proper understanding of sea environment and strengthening the ranks of experts in this field.

articles.title: Songun Leadership of WPK Is Banner for Victory: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Leadership of WPK Is Banner for Victory: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates an article to the 12th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution". 
					 The work, published on Jan. 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies that the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea correctly reflects the requirements of the times and the revolution as it regards President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army and the military affairs as its basis and starting point.  It also clarifies that the Songun politics is powerful and dignified politics of independence as it embodies the Juche idea, unique socialist political mode which newly and scientifically elucidated the issue of the driving force of the revolution.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun revolutionary line, Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, the political and ideological position of the DPRK has been consolidated as firm as rock and the Korean revolution could win one victory after another despite severe storms of history, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks has been strengthened in every way and the might of the invincible military power is fully demonstrated and miracles and innovations are ceaselessly brought about in the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 All the servicepersons and people of the DPRK are now filled with the firm will to be faithful to the party's leadership,  bearing in mind the slogan of faith "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Un!"
					
					 The fighting capability of the Korean People's Army as the first line standard-bearers, driving force of the Songun revolution, is fully displayed not only in national defence but also in socialist construction. This clearly proves the validity and vitality of the Songun revolutionary line of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 The Songun revolutionary line of the party is scientific and ever-victorious.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Danger of Japan's Nuclear Weaponization
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Danger of Japan's Nuclear Weaponization
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The disclosure of a diplomatic document dealing with the fact that Japan allowed the U.S introduction of nukes at the talks between the then Director General of the Defence Agency Nakasone and the  U.S military boss in September 1970, is  sparking off furor.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Japan advanced the "three non-nuclear principles" but perpetrated acts of increasing the danger of a nuclear war and disturbing peace under this signboard.
					
					 Japan has never abandoned its ambition to go nuclear.
					
					 One can say that Japan's nuclear weaponization has become official and legal. 
					
					 Japan has systematically studied and developed the technology related to nuclear weapons and steadily stockpiled plutonium. As a result, it is capable of manufacturing and having access to nukes anytime if it has a will. 
					
					 The Japanese militarist forces' nuclear weaponization is aimed to launch overseas aggression and operations to conquer the world. Herein lies the danger of Japan's nuclear weaponization.
					
					 The world is watching with high vigilance the Japanese reactionaries' moves to go nuclear. 
					
					 Japan should bear in mind that its nuclear weaponization is bound to lead to national ruin.
					
					 If Japan ignites a nuclear war, it will disappear on the earth before shaking off its disgrace of being a defeated nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails Japan's Moves to Embellish Crime-woven History
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails Japan's Moves to Embellish Crime-woven History
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Recently an official concerned of the Japanese consulate general in New York requested a textbook publishing house in the U.S. to rewrite a textbook.
					 Minju Joson on Wednesday says in this regard:
					
					 These days the Japanese reactionaries are going busy embellishing their crime-woven history. This is a foolish act of brazen-faced guys. 
					
					 They should seriously think about the reason why the international community is terming Japan a "political dwarf" and an immoral country, and choose to settle its past wrongdoings as early as possible.
					
					 They allowed textbook publishing houses to delete such words as sexual slavery and forcible drafting even in textbooks for senior high schools in a bid to cover up the most hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity and embellish Japan's history of aggression, disregarding its public opinion and the demands of the international community.
					
					 Not content with this, they are touring different countries to cover up and embellish the shameful sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 This clearly proves that they have not an iota of conscience and reason and are still not feeling guilty of the crimes.
					
					 They are adding to their thrice-cursed crimes. This clearly proves that they are the most depraved guys in the world.
					
					 The above-said desperate acts of Japan will only invite isolation from the international community.

articles.title: More Human Rights Abuses within S. Korean Army Disclosed
articles.content:
More Human Rights Abuses within S. Korean Army Disclosed
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Human rights abuses have been frequently committed within the south Korean army since the outset of the year, according to the south Korean website News 1 on Jan. 24.
					 An officer of a unit in Yanggu, south Korean Kangwon Province assaulted soldiers.
					
					 At a unit in Hwachon, south Korean Kangwon Province a sergeant assaulted a staff sergeant several times and he sexually abused other soldiers by photographing scenes of taking bath.
					
					 A 22 year-old soldier of a unit, who went home on furlough, was found dead in his home in Nam District, Ulsan City on Jan. 22.
					
					 A 23 year-old soldier is under police investigation as he was accused of complicity in the death of a woman in her fifties due to the fire which broke out in Panghak-dong, Tobong District, Seoul.
					
					 A missing soldier of the 31st Division of the army was found dead on a shore in Mokpho, South Jolla Province, a week later.

articles.title: S. Korea Denounced for Conniving at Scattering of Leaflets
articles.content:
S. Korea Denounced for Conniving at Scattering of Leaflets
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on January 20 at which they denounced the authorities for conniving at human scum's scattering of leaflets against the DPRK, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo.
					 Speakers said that they could not but question the authorities if they have a will to improve the inter-Korean relations as they connived at the operations of the "Alliance for the Movement of Free North" and a U.S. organization to scatter leaflets.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 It is the double-dealing attitude without sincerity for the authorities to talk about "unification" while conniving at the acts of rattling the nerves of the north behind the scene.
					
					 If the south Korean chief executive sincerely wants dialogue between the south and the north and has the will for reunification she should hold in check the scattering of leaflets against the DPRK.
					
					 Civic and public organizations and religious bodies will get united to wage a struggle if she turns down this demand of people of all social strata.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to immediately stop the anti-reunification moves such as support to the scattering of leaflets and its interference in internal affairs.

articles.title: Full Play to Enthusiasm for National Harmony Called for
articles.content:
Full Play to Enthusiasm for National Harmony Called for
 Tokyo, January 27 (KNS-KCNA) -- Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, released a statement on Jan. 26 in support of the appeal to all the Koreans adopted at the joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the appeal made at the joint meeting to dynamically open up a broad avenue to independent reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans is a patriotic one for national reunification to bring about a great turn in the inter-Korean ties this year.
					
					 The statement expressed full support for the appeal, and went on:
					
					 The key to ending the tragedy of national division that has lasted for 70 years and opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification lies in defusing the danger of war and creating a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula and terminating the confrontation of social systems.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should break with their American master hell-bent on frantic war drills targeting the north, moves to stifle it and reckless actions hostile to it.
					
					 They should no longer trample down the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for reunification common to the nation, and precious successes made in the course of implementing them and stop the fascist suppression of the pro-democracy progressive forces at once and opt to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 It is high time all the fellow countrymen gave the fullest play to their enthusiasm for national harmony and independent reunification.
					
					 The statement called upon the officials of the women's union and Korean women in Japan to dynamically turn out in the nationwide struggle to usher in another June 15 era at any cost.

articles.title: Appeal of DPRK Supported by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Appeal of DPRK Supported by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement on Jan. 25 in support of the appeal of a joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK published on Jan. 20.
					 The statement fully supported the appeal, considering it as a patriotic call which reflects the unanimous aspiration and will of the nation to improve the inter-Korean relations and make a decisive breakthrough for national reunification by concerted efforts of Koreans.
					
					 It is the unanimous aspiration and wishes of all Koreans to make this year, the 70th anniversary of national division and the 65th anniversary of the outbreak of the Korean war, the first year free from war drills conducted with foreign forces and a year of history where peace settled in the Korean peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop nuclear war exercises against fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces for aggression, discontinue leaflet scattering and "human rights" racket against the DPRK and opt for the improvement of inter-Korean relations, independent reunification, dialogue and negotiations with sincerity from a new stance in line with the aspiration of the nation and requirements of the times.
					
					 They should make a right option, bearing in mind that the prospect of mending inter-Korean relations entirely depends on how they respond to the patriotic appeal of the DPRK.
					
					 The Chinese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration will further strengthen solidarity and alliance with the organizations for national reunification of people from all walks of life at home and abroad under the unfurled banner of By Our Nation Itself and turn out as one in a nationwide movement to reunify the country and  thus glorify this year as a year of bringing about a great turn in opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Personality as Great Man Introduced by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Personality as Great Man Introduced by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Media of Syria and Cambodia introduced the personality of supreme leader Kim Jong Un as a great man on January 4 and 12.
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath in an article titled "HE Kim Jong Un, father of soldiers" said:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, is called the father of soldiers.
					
					 He regards the service personnel as the more powerful and precious beings than any modern arms and equipment and has achieved the single-minded unity of the whole army and bolstered up the military capability with his love and trust in them.
					
					 This is very clear from his ceaseless inspection of the People's Army units.
					
					 He is a tender-hearted father of the soldiers as he looks round different places ranging from soldiers' bedrooms to mess halls, non-staple food stores and wash-cum-bath houses to learn in detail about their living conditions whenever he visits units of the People's Army.
					
					 When meeting with soldiers, he kindly asks them about their hometowns and jobs of their parents and urges commanding officers to take care of them like their kith.
					
					 For him the service personnel are the dear sons and daughters and comrades and comrades-in-arms sharing will and fate with him.
					
					 A newspaper and F.M. 90.5 Radio of Cambodia said that his politics is based on his philosophical thinking, the one firm in resolution and transparent faith and marvelous one as it is unpredictable, and cited a few examples to prove it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Beninese Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Beninese Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, released a statement on Jan. 22 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said: 
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the Korean people to victory without any failure and deviation from the line. It would be unthinkable apart from his political philosophy.
					
					 His political philosophy was the Juche idea recognized by the international community as the guiding idea for the cause of independence.
					
					 He resolved all issues arising in the revolution and construction by believing in the popular masses and relying on their strength.
					
					 He led socialist Korea to victory, pulling through all difficulties of history by dint of the Juche idea.
					
					 He consolidated socialist Korea into an invincible bulwark that any formidable enemy dared not provoke, holding higher the banner of Songun.
					
					 His politics of love and trust gripped the hearts of all people and helped strengthen the single-minded unity of the DPRK in every way.
					
					 All the members of the Socialist Party of Benin pay highest tribute to Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Personages of Bangladesh, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Personages of Bangladesh, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Bangladesh and Nigeria on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a seminar, reading session, lecture and film shows by the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies from Jan. 19 to 21. 
					
					 Shown at film shows were Korean films "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea". 
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said that Kim Jong Il wisely led the Korean people in their struggle for building socialism and reunifying the country with his Songun politics and thus achieved the great exploits for the country and nation. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would register big successes in their struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, lauded Kim Jong Il as the prominent politician, peerless patriot and benevolent father of the people who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people.
					
					 The acting chairman of the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies stressed that Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, made the DPRK demonstrate its dignity as an invincible military power, adding his exploits would shine forever along with the prosperity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Moscow on Jan. 22 under the sponsorship of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					 The preparatory committee with V. A. Petrov, chairman of the association, as its chairman, groups prominent personages of Russia.
					
					 It decided to hold meeting, book and photo exhibition, seminar and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Sofia on Jan. 22.
					 Mincho Minchev, chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the successes achieved by the Korean people in building a thriving nation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, and organize meaningful events such as meeting and seminar on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Karachi, Pakistan on Jan. 21.
					 Senator Amar Jit Malhotra was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize political and cultural events such as meeting, seminar, film show and book and photo exhibition on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star so as to praise the sacred revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and widely introduce the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving nation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Pakistani Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Pakistani Personage
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The progressive people's reverence for great Comrade Kim Jong Il is growing stronger as the days go by.
					 Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, said this at an inaugural ceremony of the national preparatory committee for celebrating leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) held in Karachi, Pakistan on Jan. 21.
					
					 Kim Jong Il demonstrated before the whole world the might of Kim Il Sung's Korea with his rare ideological and theoretical wisdom, matchless grit and outstanding strategies and tactics, performing great feats for the development of the DPRK, the secretary general noted.
					
					 Senator of Pakistan Amar Jit Malhotra praised Kim Jong Il for working heart and soul to turn the DPRK into a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a la XXIV Cumbre de la Union Africana
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a la XXIV Cumbre de la Union Africana
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 27 un mensaje de felicitacion a la XXIV Cumbre de la Union Africana a inaugurarse en Addis-Abeba.
					  En la misiva el remitente senalo que la iniciativa y los esfuerzos de la Union Africana por fortalecer la unidad y solidaridad entre los paises africanos y lograr la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo socio-economico de la region frente a las maniobras de dominacion e intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas, provocan el apoyo activo y la simpatia del pueblo coreano y los demas progresistas del mundo.
					
					 Reafirmando la posicion invariable de la RPDC de ampliar y desarrollar en una nueva alta etapa las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la Union Africana y los paises miembros, deseo mayores exitos en el trabajo de la presente cumbre para promover la rehabilitacion y el desarrollo continuo y la prosperidad conjunta de Africa.

articles.title: Jovenes de la provincia de Ryanggang visitan la casa natal de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Jovenes de la provincia de Ryanggang visitan la casa natal de Kim Jong Il
Samjiyon, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los vanguardistas juveniles de la provincia de Ryanggang realizaron del dia 22 al 27 el recorrido por su casa natal en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu.
					 Durante ese periodo, los integrantes del recorrido rindieron homenaje a los 3 Generales del monte Paektu tras depositar cestos y ramos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung levantadas en el Monumento a la Victoria en la Batalla de Pochonbo, el lugar de batalla revolucionaria de Pochonbo, el campamento de Chongbong y a las orillas del lago Samji y ante el mural de mosaicos con la imagen de los 3 Generales en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu.
					
					  Llegados a Pochonbo, escucharon explicaciones sobre el lugar de batalla revolucionaria y recorrieron el puesto de mando de la batalla de Pochonbo, la estacion de policia y el ayuntamiento del canton, etc.
					
					  Arribaron al campamento secreto del monte Paektu luego de pasar por el manantial de Posori, la meseta de Junghung y el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Rimyongsu y los campamentos de Chongbong y Konchang.
					
					  En la casa natal del Dirigente en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu, pasaron revista a los objetos historicos conservados en ella. Ante la casa natal del Dirigente, sostuvieron el acto de aprobacion de la carta al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  En Samjiyon, escucharon explicaciones sobre el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon y pasaron revista a las esculturas en grupos.
					
					  Durante el recorrido, tuvieron lugar diversas actividades politicas y culturales tales como el estudio mediante las preguntas y respuestas, el concurso de coro de canciones revolucionarias y encuentro de recreo, etc.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela peligrosidad de maniobras de armamento nuclear de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela peligrosidad de maniobras de armamento nuclear de Japon
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- En Japon fue publicado el documento diplomatico, segun el cual en septiembre de 1970, Nakasone, entonces director general de la Agencia de Defensa, permitio la introduccion de armas nucleares norteamericanas en su pais durante las conversaciones con la autoridad militar de Estados Unidos.
					 Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este miercoles un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					  Japon presento "3 principios de desnuclearizacion", pero detras de la cortina, aumento el peligro de guerra nuclear y recurrio a los actos perturbadores de la paz.
					
					  Japon nunca abandona la ambicion de armamento nuclear.
					
					  Se puede decir que el armamento nuclear de Japon ha sido formalizado y legalizado.
					
					  Japon ya investigo y desarrollo sistematicamente la tecnologia de armas nucleares y vino depositando constantemente el plutonio. Y tiene la capacidad de fabricar y poseer esas armas de destruccion masiva cuando le de la gana.
					
					  La posesion de armas nucleares de Japon es una cuestion de tiempo.
					
					  El armamento nuclear de las fuerzas militaristas japonesas tiene el objetivo de tomar con armas nucleares el camino de agresion al ultramar y conquista del mundo.
					
					  He aqui hay la peligrosidad de las maniobras de armamento nuclear de Japon.
					
					  El mundo lo observa con alta vigilancia.
					
					  Japon debe tener presente que el armamento nuclear es el camino de autodestruccion.
					
					  Si Japon provoca la guerra nuclear, sera eliminado sin liberarse de la deshonra del  pais derrotado en la guerra.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena intento de Japon de embellecer historia criminal
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena intento de Japon de embellecer historia criminal
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco un relacionado con el consulado general de Japon en Nueva York pidio oficialmente a la editorial de manuales de Estados Unidos  enmendar el contenido de manual.
					  En estos dias, los reaccionarios japoneses andan ajetreados por camuflar su historia llena de crimenes ensangrentados.
					
					  Asi inicia el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses deben reflexionar seriamente por que la sociedad internacional califica a Japon de "enano politico" y de pais vil en lo moral y liquidar cuanto antes el pasado.
					
					  Ellos permitieron tachar las frases tales como la esclavitud sexual y el reclutamiento forzoso, hasta en los manuales de las escuelas superiores de su pais para encubrir el brutal crimen anti-etico de gran tamano de los imperialistas japoneses y maquillar la historia de agresion sin hacer caso de la opinion publica de los habitantes de su pais y la demanda de la sociedad internacional.
					
					  Insatisfechos con ello, andan por el mundo con el fin de encubrir y camuflar el crimen de esclavitud sexual del viejo ejercito japones.
					
					  Esto demuestra claramente que los reaccionarios japoneses no tienen la conciencia y la razon ni se sienten culpables todavia.
					
					  Por mucho que actuen con frenesi por encubrir su crimen anti-etico y camuflar su historia llena de crimenes, esto causara solo el aislamiento y el rechazo de la sociedad internacional. -0-
